Class LinearRegression

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearRegression

  • public class LinearRegression
extends java.lang.Object
    The class LinearRegression implements gradient descent with 1 variable.

    • Method Detail

      • addSample

        public void addSample(double x,
                      double y)
        Adds a new sample to sample and to samplesValues. This method must be iteratively called with all the samples before the gradient descent can be started
        Parameters:
        x - the new sample
        y - the corresponding expected value

      • currentHypothesis

        Parameters:

        numberOfSteps - how many iteration of the algorithm to run
